Description: Solid-cast copper figure of the Apis Bull; wearing the solar-disc and uraeus; incised decoration including a triangle on the forehead, a collar, a winged sun-disc, a saddle-cloth and a vulture; 2 rods below the back legs.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Dr Joseph John Acworth
Curator's comments: Published: Barcelona, Toros/Bulls, p.312-313, Cat. No.14 = The Bull in the Mediterranean World, Athens 2003, pp.156 - 157 [14].
Bibliographic references: Barcelona 2002 / The Bull in the Mediterranean World (cat.14, p.156)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: Exhibition: "The Bull in the Ancient World / Bulls: Image and Cult in the ancient Mediterranean", Salo del Tinell, Barcelona, 14 Nov 2002-13 Feb 2003; then Benaki Museum, Athens, 14 Nov 2002-7 Jun 2003.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Mrs Marion Whiteford Acworth JP
